壽.definition: long life; old age; age; life; birthday; funerary

壽光.definition: Shouguang, county-level city in Weifang 濰坊|潍坊[Wei2 fang1], Shandong

壽光市.definition: Shouguang, county-level city in Weifang 濰坊|潍坊[Wei2 fang1], Shandong

壽命.definition: life span; life expectancy; lifetime (of a machine)

壽命不長.definition: one's days are numbered; not to have long to live (often fig.)

壽堂.definition: mourning hall; a hall for a birthday celebration

壽寧.definition: Shouning county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

壽寧縣.definition: Shouning county in Ningde 寧德|宁德[Ning2 de2], Fujian

壽帶.definition: (bird species of China) Amur paradise flycatcher (Terpsiphone incei)

壽星.definition: god of longevity; elderly person whose birthday is being celebrated

壽桃.definition: (myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu; fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift

壽桃包.definition: longevity peach bun; birthday peach bun

壽比南山.definition: Live as long as the Zhongnan Mountains! (idiom); Long may you live!

壽王墳.definition: Shouwangfen town, in Chengde 承德市[Cheng2 de2 shi4], Hebei

壽王墳鎮.definition: Shouwangfen town, in Chengde 承德市[Cheng2 de2 shi4], Hebei

壽終.definition: to die of old age; to live to a ripe old age; (fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)

壽終正寢.definition: to die of old age; to die in one's bed at a ripe old age; (fig.) (of a structure or machine etc) to come to the end of its life

壽縣.definition: Shou County or Shouxian, a county in Huainan 淮南[Huai2nan2], Anhui

壽豐.definition: Shoufeng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan

壽豐鄉.definition: Shoufeng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan

壽陽.definition: Shouyang county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

壽陽縣.definition: Shouyang county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

壽險.definition: life insurance (abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险[ren2shou4 bao3xian3])
